disease_name: Glycogen storage disease due to liver and muscle phosphorylase kinase deficiency

socioeconomic_analysis.disease_name: Glycogen storage disease due to liver and muscle phosphorylase kinase deficiency

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative description of clinical burden and management (dietary therapy with corn starch)
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Orphanet report on Glycogen storage disease due to liver and muscle phosphorylase kinase deficiency

socioeconomic_analysis.justification: Only qualitative burden descriptions and management guidelines were identified (Orphanet report); no published cost-of-illness or economic burden studies specific to this disease were found.
